item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Be prepared for the worst, my love, for it lives next door to the best." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description: "Hope can be a powerful force. Maybe there's no actual magic in it, but when you know what you hope for most and hold it like a light within you, you can make things happen, almost like magic." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "I guess in the end, it doesn’t matter what we wanted. What matters is what we chose to do with the things we had." -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description:
"This is a love story. I never knew there were so many kinds of love or that love could make people do so many different things.
I never knew there were so many different ways to say goodbye." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Sir Topher finally looked up. “Because any hope beyond that, my boy, would be too much. I feared we would drown in it.” "Then I choose to drown,” Finnikin said. “In hope. Rather than float into nothing." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Brodi Ashton
item.description:
"He leaned forward and said, "Tell me, friend. Is there more for us?"
I looked down at my feet. "There's everything for us." -- Brodi Ashton

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description:
"I don't know many rules to live by,' he'd said. 'But here's one. It's simple. Don't put anything unnecessary into yourself. No poisons or chemicals, no fumes or smoke or alcohol, no sharp objects, no inessential needles--drug or tattoo--and...no inessential penises either.'
'Inessential penises?' Karou had repeated, delighted with the phrase in spite of her grief. 'Is there any such thing as an essential one?'
'When an essential one comes along, you'll know,' he'd replied." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "My mother once told me that no woman is naked when she comes equipped with a bad mood and a steady glare." -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "Me, I say those are all great things to live for, if they're what happens to float your boat, but at the end of the day, there's got to be somebody you're doing it for. Just one person you're thinking of everytime you make a decision, everytime you tell the truth, or tell a lie, or anything. I've got mine. Do you?" -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "It's the oldest story in the world. Boy loves girl. Boy loses girl. Boy gets girl back thanks to the unethical behavior of megalomaniacal mad scientists who never met a corpse they wouldn't try to resurrect. Anyone coming within a hundred yards of my happy ending had better pray that they're immune to bullets. - Shaun Mason" -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "Every life has a watershed moment, an instant when you realize you're about to make a choice that will define everything else you ever do, and that if you choose wrong, there may not be that many things left to choose. Sometimes the wrong choice is the only one that lets you face the end with dignity, grace, and the awareness that you're doing the right thing. I'm not sure we can recognize those moments until they've passed us." -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "I am, in fact, immortal when annoyed." -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "I feel the closest to crazy when I'm disagreeing with the voice in my head" -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "I suggest it’s time we head off to see the Wizard. The wonderful Wizard of Jesus We Are All So Fucked." -- Mira Grant

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Brodi Ashton
item.description: "In the dark, dank world of the Tunnels, I would call upon this memory. And there would be a flicker of candlelight. If only for a moment. I closed my eyes, as if my eyelids were the levers of a printing press, etching the fibers into my mind. Memories were outside Cole’s reach. As long as I held them, memories were mine and mine alone." -- Brodi Ashton

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "Maybe she'd always been there. Maybe strangers enter your heart first and then you spent the rest of your life searching for them. " -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "A piece of me is gone," she told me once while we were bra shopping. "I think we're made up of all these different pieces and every time someone goes, you're left with less of yourself." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "If we forget who we lost, then we forget who we once were, and if we forget who we once were, we lose sight of who we are now." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "He knows bad days. Bad days take him completely by surprise. They make him not trust the good days because it's likely something is lurking twenty-four hours away." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "I've been waiting for you all night and day,' she said. Froi shivered. He realised that the words came from Quintana the ice maiden. Realised, as he felt his face heating up, that the idea of this Quintana waiting for him with excitement spoke to parts of him he believed to be dormant. And then she winked. 'Did I do that right?' she asked. Her smile was lopsided and he saw a glimpse of the teeth. And Froi imagined that he would follow her to the ends of the earth." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Melina Marchetta
item.description: "I heard your song the moment we were born. And years later, it dragged me back from the lake of the half-dead when all I wanted to do was die. Each time someone tried to kill me, it sang its tune and gave me hope." -- Melina Marchetta

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Cath Crowley
item.description: "I guess love's kind of like a marshmallow in a microwave on high. After it explodes it's still a marshmallow. but, you know, now it's a complicated marshmallow." -- Cath Crowley

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "That is ridiculous," she said. The king agreed. "Like falling in love with a landslide. Only you could fail to notice." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Courtney add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
Courtney add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
